## Important Information

*   **Lateness Penalties:** Please ensure you submit on time. Lateness penalties apply.
*   **Academic Misconduct:** Review the guidance on how to avoid academic misconduct.
*   **Submission:** All work should be submitted via the Turnitin dropbox on Learn.
*   **Anonymity:** Include your **exam number** (e.g., B135425) as the first part of your submission title. Do not include your name.

## Grading

All assessments are graded using the [University of Edinburgh Common Marking Scheme](https://www.ed.ac.uk/timetabling-examinations/exams/regulations/common-marking-scheme).
